name: Christmas Pizza Appetizer
author: JENHA
summary: This cold, pizza-style appetizer is a refreshing change from heavier Christmas fare.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package crescent roll dough, unrolled and divided into triangles
¼ cup light mayonnaise-style salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
¼ cup finely chopped broccoli florets
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Arrange crescent roll triangles in the shape of a Christmas tree on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes
Let cool while making the topping
Mix cream cheese, sour cream, salad dressing, and dressing mix together
Spread mixture over the cooled crescent tree
Top with bell pepper, broccoli, and Cheddar cheese
